title: Enhancing AI Practical Competencies: Information Text Genre Recognition Improvement Program Based on Variation Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental text analysis skills and foundational social studies concepts
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify the five core genre features of informational texts (structure, vocabulary, purpose, audience, context) with 80% accuracy.
After performing variation theory-based learning activities (contrast-contrast-generalization pattern), improve text genre creation ability to at least level 3 on a 4-point evaluation scale.
Generate case studies applying situationally appropriate genre transformation strategies to diverse social field texts with 70% or higher accuracy.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
